news.title: Smoking avatars and online games: how big tobacco targets young people in the metaverse
news.summary: Cigarettes and vapes are being smuggled into virtual spaces beyond the reach of regulation. Virtual online spaces are becoming a new marketing battleground as tobacco and alcohol promoters target young people.

news.title: UK border officials to use AI to verify ages of child asylum seekers
news.summary: Trial of technology comes as official report warns existing system has been failing for at least a decade. Officials are to start using artificial intelligence to help estimate the age of asylum seekers who say they are children.

news.title: Silicon Valley trades researchers like football teams poach players
news.summary: Big tech is offering athlete-level pay to lure AI researchers in a high-stakes race for dominance. Tech companies are tasking the star players of their AI squads with developing technology that can outperform humans in any task.

news.title: The best kettles to save energy and speed up your cuppa, tested
news.summary: Not all electric kettles are created equal. We boiled litres of water to find the best. From hard-water heroes to vintage-style, repairable and wi-fi connected models.
